## i2cClose() function

This closes the I2C device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function i2cClose(handle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
